Name: 打豹虎 Spider Derby
About the game: Spider derby is a blood sport involving spiders that occurs in different forms in several areas of the world. In this game, you need to explore new land to catch new spider for fighting. At the same time, you need to train it even use a new spider to feed it. Mission Beat the last land spiders How to Play Catch, training, use item and install soul on your spider. Pick 3 spider to challenge another spider. Only victory when you win more than 2 from 3 matches. Keep challenge those land protector spiders, explore new land after gain the new land. Game Features Pick 3 spider to fight with other spiders Each spider allow learn 3 skill Each spider had own characteristic Sire new spider base on the inherent stat and abilities Explore land to gain soul and gem Each other spider had own strengths and weakness Catch new spider to build up your legion Install soul to improve your spider After challenge new land, will gain bonus effect to let your spider stronger Prevent your favourite dead on after the fight Use item to support your spider, even grow up
